Title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash

Description: Work comfortably on this Realspace Magellan manager's desk. The slide-out keyboard tray conveniently holds your computer's keyboard, while the file drawer keeps paperwork neatly tucked. Featuring a paper laminate finish, this desk resists scratches and endures water spills for lasting use. This 59-inch Realspace Magellan manager's desk features 3 box drawers for storage, and the medium-density fiberboard provides sturdy support.

Medium-density fiberboard material for sturdy support.

Slide-out keyboard tray.

4 drawers for neat storage of supplies.

Medium desk recommended for home or professional use.
